articles.description: The White House next week will start shipping coronavirus vaccines directly to retail pharmacies alongside ongoing deliveries to states, increasing weekly supplies of shots nationwide to 11.5 million, a top aide said on Tuesday.
articles.content:
(Adds comment from AmerisourceBergen and Walgreens)
